main.title: Welcome to Disclave.
main.subtitle: Start discussion anywhere on the internet.

url.placeholder: Input URL to start the discussion...

plugins.title: Promote own content
plugins.text: Do you have your website, or are you a web developer? Display comments and allow users to interact with them without leaving your page. Install Disclave plugin and let users promote your content.

extensions.title: Stay on the website
extensions.text: Comment on any website on the internet, directly from your browser, without leaving it or stopping reading. Quickly view the opinions of others and let them know what do you think.

mobile.title: Mobile version
mobile.text: Are you using a browser on a mobile device? You can easily access and add comments by installing Disclave on your device.
